articles.title: UK inflation rate surprises with rise to 4%, led by alcohol and tobacco - CNBC
articles.description: U.K. inflation unexpectedly nudged upwards to 4% year-on-year in December.
articles.content:
LONDON U.K. inflation unexpectedly nudged upwards to 4% year-on-year in December, fueled by a rise in alcohol and tobacco prices.

articles.content:
Health officials have warned of further measles outbreaks across England after cases in the West Midlands rose by more than 30% in less than a week.

articles.title: UK-wide study reveals harm done by people not getting COVID jabs - Medical Xpress
